detail_desc: V-neck satin top with a lace trim at the top and super-skinny shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short coat in soft pile with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Iron-on letter patch to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 9.5x10.5 cm.
Jersey T-shirt with a wide neck and chest pocket.

Fitted, knee-length, sleeveless dress in a stretch weave with a round neckline. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a close-fitting skirt with decorative buttons and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.

Short, straight-cut dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Joggers in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and tapered legs. Wide, elasticated jersey panel at the top for best fit over the tummy.
Cotton jersey vest tops in a narrow cut at the top with a flare top the hem. Rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
One-shoulder body in ribbed jersey with one narrow shoulder strap and press-studs at the crotch. Lined over the bust.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening at the top and frilled collar with ties at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in sturdy, heavyweight satin. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, seams with decorative gathers and a discreet zip in one side with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Lined.
Jacket in soft washed denim with a collar, and press-studs down the front and at the cuffs.
Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short sleeves and slits at the front. Unlined.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a foil print. Round neckline, an open section with wrapover sides at the back, and long sleeves. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Dance dress in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow shoulder straps and deep armholes. Integral, lined sports bra with shoulder straps and an elastic hem.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and button placket.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in organic cotton. Bodysuit in ribbed jersey with buttons at the top and press-studs at the crotch. Dungarees in woven fabric with elastication at the waist and hems, a patch pocket on one leg and straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, pleats at the front and a V-shaped opening at the back with wide ties at the back of the neck. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with decorative zips at the top and decorative seams.
Short-sleeved wrapover top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elasticated seam at the waist and sewn-in tie at the side.

Short dress in a soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Vertical seams down the front and top of the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a soft cotton weave with a square neckline, buttons down the front and flutter sleeves.
Large, heart-shaped earrings in metal with plastic beads. Length 7 cm.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in soft, airy jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a round neck and straight hem.

V-neck T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a double trim around the neckline and sleeves. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and gently tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Cropped top in soft jersey with lace details, a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short coat in woven fabric with a tie belt at the waist and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Concealed button at the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
Short, knitted jumper with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Lightly padded, patterned jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated frill trim and opening with ties at the top. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and short sleeves. Lined.
Shorts in soft, printed jersey with covered elastication and decorative bow at the waist, a small frill trim at the top and side pockets.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.

Ankle-length boiler suit in soft viscose twill with buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and a seam with covered elastication and a tie belt at the waist.
Hammered metal rings in various designs.
Paper straw hat with a band.
Long-sleeved top in thin sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads with an appliqué on the front.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in an airy cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves and a small chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Cropped, fitted top in ribbed jersey with wide shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Shorter, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline and short sleeves.

Boxy jacket in wide-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, large buttons at the front, patch pockets with a flap and button and a concealed side pocket at the front. Dropped shoulders and straight sleeves with adjustable tabs and buttons at the cuffs. Unlined.

Underdress in stretch microfibre with a light shaping effect on the tummy, seat and thighs. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a scallop trim and glued edges at the top for a smooth silhouette. Laser-cut hems.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a gently rounded hem.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, decorative drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.
Shorter top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a decorative tie detail at the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Elasticated waistband with a drawstring, and diagonal side pockets.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Knee-length, A-line dress in sturdy slub jersey made from a cotton blend with a square neckline and elastication around the top. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Fine-knit cardigan with notch lapels and a double-breasted front with gold-coloured metal buttons.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a collar, buttons down the front, extra-long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Glittery jumpsuit in an airy weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front, a narrow elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and straight, ankle-length legs. Lined.
Coat in a woven wool blend with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, wide, rounded sleeves and a detachable tie belt. Lined.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and a smocked hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Mesh key pocket in the waistband.
KELZUKI x H&M. Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a text print and flock print on the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric. High paper bag waist with wide elastication, a small frill trim and wide, detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Cardigan in chunky-knit, soft wool with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Blouse in embroidered lace with frills and a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back. Long, balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Short, gently flared nightslip in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
High-waisted trousers in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets and extra-long, wide, straight legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
Padded, fitted jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and fleece-lined front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
